articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Ethiopian President
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Girma Wolde-Giorgis, president of Ethiopia, on its national day. 
					 Kim in the message wished the friendly Ethiopian people greater progress and prosperity, expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Azerbaijani President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Azerbaijani President
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Ilham Aliyev, president of Azerbaijan, on its national day. 
					 In the message Kim wished him success in the work for development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in line with the desire and wish of the two peoples.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets FM of Azerbaijan
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets FM of Azerbaijan
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Monday sent a message of greetings to his Azerbaijani counterpart Elmar Mamediyarov on the occasion of its national day. 
					 Pak expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing him success in the work for the development of foreign relations.

articles.title: Journalists Union Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
Journalists Union Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Journalists Union of Korea led by Song Rak Gyun, editor-in-chief of Pyongyang Sinmun, and the art troupe of the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" left here on Monday to visit China. 
					 Meanwhile, the delegation of the DPRK Football Association led by Vice-Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Jong Su came back home after taking part in the 62nd Conference of FIFA in Budapest, Hungary.  The delegation of the Vietnamese paper Nhan DAN led by its Editor-in-Chief Thuan Huu flew back on the same day after winding up its visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Chinese SAIC Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese SAIC Delegation Here
  Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce of China led by Vice Minister Fu Shuangjian arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Remains of Martyr Buried in Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Remains of Martyr Buried in Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Remains of the late So Man Sul, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and labor hero who was chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), were buried in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery on the outskirts of Pyongyang.
					 So Man Sul devoted his all to the efforts to uphold the idea and leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il till the last moments of his life and made a distinguished contribution to the development of the Juche-oriented overseas compatriots movement.
					
					 A burial ceremony took place at the cemetery on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Yong Rim, Yang Hyong Sop and Kim Yang Gon, officials of power organs, social organizations, ministries, relevant organs for overseas compatriots and religious organizations, officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and the bereaved families and relatives of the deceased.
					
					 DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made an eulogy.
					
					 He said that So Man Sul could earn reputation as a genuine revolutionary, ardent patriot and experienced overseas Korean activist known to the homeland and the nation and the world thanks to the trust and loving care of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He stressed that the homeland and its people would always remember the noble career and immortal feats of So Man Sul who enjoys immortality under the care of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Amid the playing of funeral music and firing of a volley the remains of the deceased were buried in his grave.
					
					 Senior officials of the party and state and bereaved families of the deceased spread earth over his remains.
					
					 Seen standing at his grave was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed there were wreaths in the name of the Presidium of the DPRK SPA, the Cabinet, a friendly party, the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, social organizations, ministries, relevant organs for overseas compatriots and religious organizations and bouquets.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased.

articles.title: Buddhist Masses Held at Temples across Country
articles.content:
Buddhist Masses Held at Temples across Country
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The "celebration of the birthday of Buddha, 2556 Buddhist masses praying the country's reunification" took place at temples across the DPRK on Monday.
					 Present there were office bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea and its provincial, city and county committees, monks of temples and believers.
					
					 Rituals and speeches were made at the event.
					
					 The speakers said they were celebrating the "birthday of Buddha" at a time when all the people of the country are waging a dynamic general advance for glorifying this year as a year of shining victories in which golden days of a thriving nation are ushered in hearty response to the New Year joint editorial.
					
					  They called on all Buddhists at home and abroad to unit in the Dharma-minded concord under the uplifted slogan "Let all Koreans open the gate to the reunified country, full of fresh confidence!" and courageously turn out in the struggle for achieving the country's reunification.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' reckless moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK have created an extremely grave situation and difficulties in the way of developing the north-south relations and achieving the country's reunification, they noted.
					
					 They urged all Buddhists in the north and south and overseas to take practical actions to hold fast to the stance of national independence and priority to the nation, achieve national reconciliation and unity and check and foil the war moves of bellicose forces at home and abroad.
					
					 Then a prayer for the country's reunification was read out.
					
					 It reflected the firm will of all the Buddhists to wipe out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors hell-bent on hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership and system in the DPRK and extreme provocations and accomplish the historic cause of the country's reunification at any cost by the concerted efforts of Koreans under the banner of the north-south joint declaration.

articles.title: DPRK Holds Title of 2012 ITTF World Tour China Open
articles.content:
DPRK Holds Title of 2012 ITTF World Tour China Open
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK player Ri Myong Sun held the title of woman's singles in the 2012 ITTF World Tour, China Open, Shanghai.
					 It brought together a lot of excellent players from different countries and regions. 
					
					 In the finals she rivaled a Japanese player who has been on a winning streak in five games this year. 
					
					 She trounced her Japanese rival 4:1, bagging a gold medal.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts US Intention to Sell Pursuit Fighters to S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts US Intention to Sell Pursuit Fighters to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea announced a plan to purchase new type pursuit fighters some days ago.
					 Munitions enterprises of the U.S. and Europe including Boeing and Lockheed Martin are vying with each other to sell the above-said fighters to south Korea. The 60 aircraft reportedly placed on order are ultramodern military hardware.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 What should not go unnoticed is the deal in the above-said fighters between war merchants of the West and south Korea. 
					
					 The U.S. massive shipment of cutting-edge military hardware to south Korea through war merchants is to implement its Asia-Pacific policy, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The U.S. strategic scenario which made Asia-Pacific the focus of its foreign policy is to deter other powers from expanding their influence on this region and hold supremacy there. 
					
					 It is the calculation of the U.S. to put the newly emerging Asia-Pacific under its control and realize its wild ambition to dominate the whole world.
					
					 The DPRK is made the primary target of the U.S. strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. war-like forces are arming their south Korean puppet forces with ultramodern military hardware, crying out for coping with the non-existent "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 In case a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, no one can guess its consequences.
					
					 And it is the fact recognized by everybody that the DPRK is not the only target of the U.S. strikes.
					
					 It is beyond any doubt that such U.S. action as equipping its forces in south Korea and the south Korean puppet army with ultramodern military hardware would rattle the nerves of the powers around south Korea and spark off a new arms race and eventually lead to upsetting the military strategic equilibrium and disturbing stability in the region.
					
					 Asia-Pacific can never turn into a zone of peace as long as the U.S. and its allies warmongers are allowed to go on wild.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Escalating Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Escalating Anti-DPRK Campaign
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is so blinded by confrontation with compatriots that it is getting frantic with the anti-DPRK smear campaign not only in south Korea but abroad, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					 The puppet forces' policy of escalating the confrontation is aimed to malignantly defame the dignified system in the DPRK and bring it down, zealously pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward it, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The group fabricated conspiratorial cases, large and small, one after another including "Cheonan" incident and worked hard to cover up the truth about them through hideous anti-DPRK confrontation rackets. It, at the same time, cracked down upon those who spoke truth after gagging them.
					
					 The group blocked and scuttled inter-Korean dialogues and cooperation undertakings between the north and the south under the pretext of "May 24 step" by citing the above-said conspiratorial cases. Crying out for "boosting the alliance" with the U.S., the puppet group kicked off an international campaign for "sanctions" against the DPRK and massively hurled outside forces for aggression into south Korea for madcap large-scale north-targeted war drills.
					
					 The group of traitors perpetrated such unprecedentedly hideous provocations without let-up as daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and brought the dangerous confrontation between the differing two systems to its height.
					
					 This group can never drop its inborn despicable bad habit unless it is buried in its cemetery, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea's Saber-rattling
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea's Saber-rattling
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- South Korean warmongers staged madcap "Thaeguk" exercises from May 21 to 25 allegedly aimed at examining the capability to settle a crisis and conduct operations and increasing the capability to operate joint combat power under the simulated conditions of someone's "diverse threat of provocations". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The warmongers claimed that the exercises were aimed to cope with the "threat of provocations from the north" on the ground and seas and in the air, but they can never conceal their provocative and aggressive nature, the commentary says, and continues:
					
					 The warmongers conducted the above-said drills under the provocative codename of "River Amnok" from 1995 but they changed it into "Thaeguk" from 2005. This saber-rattling is designed to establish "combined operation system" for aggression with the U.S.
					
					 Since Lee Myung Bak came to power, the aggressive nature of "Thaeguk" has been pronounced. 
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the Lee group in stepping up the moves for a war, becoming more vociferous about "additional provocations" from someone than ever before. It is to shift the blame for the catastrophic situation on the Korean Peninsula onto the DPRK and steadily escalate the tension, backed by the U.S., and ignite a war against the north, while watching for a chance to do so. 
					
					 "Additional provocations" touted by the group is nothing but rhetoric to realize the criminal scenarios of the U.S. master dreaming of dominating Asia and those keen on invading the north. 
					
					 The Lee group is no more than a heinous nuclear war servant keen to bring the disaster of a fratricidal war, subservient to outside forces, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Fascist Action against Opposition Party
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Fascist Action against Opposition Party
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A few days ago Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea conducted a search operation against the building of the Unified Progressive Party, confiscating three servers that contained the list of party members. It was unprecedented crackdown that the prosecution took away even the party member list, not content with the wholesale investigation into the opposition party on charge of "election" fraud.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The fascist action taken by the Lee Myung Bak group against the UPP is nothing but dastardly political terrorism to undermine it and break solidarity among opposition parties in a bid to realize its ambition for stay in power. 
					
					 The reality clearly shows that the present regime in south Korea whose power is in the hands of traitor Lee is hordes of fascist gangsters who stoop to any infamy to meet their partisan interests and gratify their greed for power. 
					
					 The recent incident was a product of the last-ditch efforts of the group of traitors to get rid of its tight corner.
					
					 What matters is the fact that the fascist authorities' repressive campaign against the progressive forces is going on under the pretext of linkage with the north.
					
					 The Lee group is loudly crying out for "elimination of the forces following the north," again trumpeting about "the coloring theory" with the "election" at hand. 
					
					 This goes to prove that the group of traitors is working hard to break the solidarity between the UPP and other opposition parties by branding the progressive and pro-reform forces as "spies of the north" and realize its ambition to stay in power as it was another vicious politically-motivated provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 But the group is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can stay in power through such clumsy trick.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Fuller Play to Revolutionary Comradeship
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Fuller Play to Revolutionary Comradeship
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Monday in an editorial calls all the people to give fuller play to the traditional traits of revolutionary unity and comradeship, bearing deep in mind the noble will and deep trust of the dear respected Kim Jong Un that he would always be a comrade-in-arms who would share destiny with comrades on the road of the Songun revolution.
					 It is the wish and will of all the service personnel and people to accomplish the behests and cause of leader Kim Jong Il without fail, holding him in high esteem forever as the leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and people and fulfill the sense of comradely obligation towards the leader to the last, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 More ardent loyalty has been expressed by all the people since the big loss to the nation. This clearly proves how genuine and unshakable the service personnel and people's sense of comradely obligation towards Kim Jong Il is.
					
					 Given full play among the people are beautiful traits of devoting their all to society, the collective and comrades. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are genuine comrades-in-arms who always share destiny shoulder to shoulder not only in the defence of the country but in socialist construction.
					
					 The service personnel are now building monumental edifices across the country greatly conducive to the improvement of the people's living standard under the uplifted slogan "Let us do more good things for the people". They give sincere labor and material assistance to the workers in production drive and protect people's lives and properties at the risk of their lives. Deeply moved by the kindred and comradely love of the service personnel, many units and workers in different parts of the country sincerely assist service personnel. A great number of graduates from secondary schools across the country are volunteering to join in the Korean People's Army to devote their youth to the defence of the country.
					
					 The above-said beautiful traits are an expression of immense pride and confidence of certain victory by the army and people of the DPRK advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The editorial calls for turning the whole party, army and society into a society of true comrades, a society of comrades-in-arms under the uplifted slogan of revolutionary comradeship.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppression of Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppression of Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Hwang Jong Gyu, chief secretary of the Solidarity for Actions for Workers' Emancipation of south Korea condemned the authorities for frantically suppressing the progressive forces on the strength of the fascist law, when interviewed by Internet radio "Voice of People" on May 25. 
					 He accused the authorities of intensifying the suppression of progressive forces as evidenced by arrests of members of the Solidarity on charge of violating the "Security Law."
					
					  He continued: What the organization has done so far is that it advocated the inevitability of the doom of capitalism and professed socialism.
					
					 Nevertheless, the authorities are working hard to destroy the organization by labeling it "an enemy-benefiting organization" on the strength of the SL.
					
					 He deplored that progressive organizations are liable to become targets of crackdown and be branded as an "enemy-benefiting organization" as long as this evil law remains in force.
					
					 The sphere of application of the law is expanding to all social fields these days, he noted, declaring his will to join those organizations which have waged a campaign for its repeal in their joint counter-actions.

articles.title: S. Korean Police's Suppression of Young Activists under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Police's Suppression of Young Activists under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police forcibly searched the houses of Kim Hyo Jang, Jang Jong Su and Kim Jae Hyon, activists of a youth organization, on charges of violating the "Security Law" on May 24.
					 The fascist police took this action on charges of "joining an enemy-benefiting organization", "possession and distribution of enemy-benefiting literature" and "praise and encouragement", asserting that they conducted activities after joining the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea as former core members of the "Group of Fellows of the Taegu Youth Association in the June 15 Era".
					
					 Chon Ki Chang, representative of the Taegu and North Kyongsang Provincial Solidarity for Civil Rights who conducted activities for a youth association together with them, declared that the ceaseless rackets of suppression including the forcible search operation against the headquarters of the Unified Progressive Party and crackdown upon the Solidarity for Practical Actions for Workers' Emancipation clearly indicate that the present regime is creating a political situation under the reign of fascism and vowed to fight against this.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution's Action to Detain Student Protesters under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution's Action to Detain Student Protesters under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Seoul District Prosecutor's Office on May 25 issued warrants of arrest for students who staged a demonstration in protest against the forcible search of the Unified Progressive Party (UPP).
					 The prosecution took this action on charges that the students disturbed the enforcement of the law and their crime was grave.
					
					 Disclosing the injustice of their charges, lawyers of the Bar Association for Democratic Society said the prosecution is citing "concern over the destruction of evidence" as a pretext for arrest.
					
					 The chairperson of the Students' Committee of the UPP branded the prosecution's action as a tyrannical step taken by the regime in its closing period to kill the progressive forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Accuses Prosecution of Suppressing Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Accuses Prosecution of Suppressing Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the Movement for the Withdrawal of the U.S. Forces issued a statement on May 24 denouncing the puppet prosecution for working hard to obliterate the progressive forces, while currying favor with the power.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The prosecution let the police seize the member list and materials related to internal work of the Unified Progressive Party citing investigation into election fraud of the party. This was dastardly political crackdown and illegal act.
					
					 The prosecution illegally seized data related to the internal work of the political party, going beyond the scope of investigation, a clear proof that its aim is to stamp out the progressive forces.
					
					 The people are well aware of the fact that the prosecution hushed or covered up the cases of corruption and irregularities of those in power and just pretended to investigate it while going desperate in its efforts to charge the progressive personages.
					
					 The search operation against the party is just a political coup. The prosecution should understand that it is included in the obliteration list together with the present "government".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Studied by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Studied by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting for studying the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was held by the General Association of Koreans in China on May 22.
					 Present there were officials of the Association.
					
					 Chairwoman Choe Un Bok said every sentence in the work of Kim Jong Un clearly indicates the road for the Korean revolution to follow in the new century of Juche.
					
					The militant slogan "Forward towards Victory!," in particular, represents his firm resolve and will to bring about a great victory despite whatever trials and difficulties facing the revolution, she said,  underlining the need for all the Koreans in China to deeply study the profound idea of the work till they fully grasp it.
					
					 Vice-Chairman Choe Su Bong expressed his resolution to faithfully uphold the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un by carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu without any slightest defection by the same working style as President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism.
					
					 Han Kil Su, director of the Publicity Department of the association, noted that no force on earth can match the might of the Korean people single-mindedly united around the leader, adding that it is the rare privilege and fortune for the Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's nation to be blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Given Publicity in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Given Publicity in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was posted on the Internet homepage of Poland The Democratic People's Republic of Korea on May 17. A detailed gist of the same work was also posted on the Internet homepage of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on May 18.
					 The work, published on April 27, 2012, clarifies the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the country's land as befitting that of a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					The basic contents of the work were carried by bulletin No. 90 of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Russian Paper on Songun Leadership of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Russian Paper on Songun Leadership of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper Patriot No. 19 carried an article titled "Banner of peace" illustrated with photos of the Songun leadership feats performed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 It said:
					
					 There is saying one should be ready for a war even if one desires peace. 
					
					 The worth of peace and true freedom is incomparably great even at present as it was before.
					
					 The Korean people have shown in practice that they would not allow anyone to deprive them of peace and freedom. They truly desire peace and perform feats for peace and freedom every day and every hour.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung performed a military miracle in the 20th century by defeating the most formidable two imperialisms in one generation. 
					
					 He trained the Korean People's Army into a-match-for-a hundred revolutionary army, put all people under arms and turned the whole country into a fortress, thus providing a powerful military guarantee for the defence of the country's sovereignty and the eternal prosperity of the nation.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, who regarded it as his lifelong mission to accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President, ushered in the greatest heyday for the development of the revolutionary armed forces with his extraordinary wisdom, outstanding commanding art and matchless grit.
					
					 This tradition is now being steadily carried forward under the energetic Songun leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un for peace and freedom and the protection of the country's sovereignty.

articles.title: Triumphant Juche Idea, Songun Idea Praised
articles.content:
Triumphant Juche Idea, Songun Idea Praised
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on May 18 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Ranks of world progressive people regarding the Juche idea, Songun idea as a banner for life and struggle are on the increase".
					 Today the scientific accuracy, truth and validity of the Juche idea and the Songun idea have been more clearly proved in the practical struggle of the Korean people as the triumphant banners of the human cause of independence, the article said.
					
					 The Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by leader Kim Jong Il has been widely disseminated in many countries and regions of the world over the last decades, it noted.
					
					 The article gave a detailed account of the fact that the work for studying and disseminating the revolutionary idea of the peerlessly great persons is brisk in various parts of the world and study organizations grouping prominent personages have been formed to conduct energetic activities. 
					
					 It is the unanimous aspiration and desire of mankind at present to study and disseminate the Juche idea, the Songun idea at a time when the imperialists have become more undisguised in their high-handed and arbitrary practices. 
					
					 The article cited facts that political parties, organizations and publishing houses of many countries are bringing out works of the President and Kim Jong Il and books introducing the originality, truth and vitality of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.

articles.title: Paper of Koreans in US on DPRK's Political Philosophy
articles.content:
Paper of Koreans in U.S. on DPRK's Political Philosophy
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, Internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on May 22 carried an article contributed by a political commentator under the title "Political philosophy of leaders of the north is love".
					 The single-minded unity of the north is based on its leader's politics of love, the article said, and went on:
					
					 We learn how noble the politics of love for the nation and the people is in the traits of the leaders of the north.
					
					 This year alone, Kim Jong Un, supreme leader, provided field guidance dozens of times. At each time, there was no place unvisited by him. Where does a mother go first after coming back home? Plainly speaking, it is a kitchen.
					
					 Such kitchen is always visited by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un. He learned about even the quality and quantity of food served to service personnel of the army units and workers.
					
					 Singled-minded unity is the source of the might of socialism. People are touched by the north's assertion that secret of this single-minded unity is love for the people.
					
					 The leader embraces the people with such loving care as a mother's and the latter believes in the former and entrusts everything to him. These relations exist in the north only.
					
					 The relations between the leader and the people are inseparable and bloody ones under the socialist system in the north. That is why the people in the north hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il as "the tender-hearted fathers of the people" and "a great incarnation of love for people".
					
					 Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders, the article said, praising his great love for the nation and the people.
					
					 The leader's love and trust served as the motive force which helped the north put an end to the history of ordeals and embark upon the road of march to build a paradise.
					
					 Such love and trust are manifested in the fact that the north is advancing for the co-prosperity of the nation hand in hand with the people in the south on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the article concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre el Parque Zoologico Nacional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre el Parque Zoologico Nacional
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Parque Zoologico Nacional.
					El estuvo primero ante el monumento construido para transmitir eternamente las inmortales hazanas de direccion de los 3 generales del monte Paektu.
					
					Recordo con emocion la orgullosa trayectoria del parque diciendo que este lugar, visitado decenas de veces por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il durante mas de 50 anos desde su fundacion, vino cumpliendo magnificamente con su mision de descansadero que pone sonrientes y alegres a los habitantes, y de centro de educacion que brinda amplios conocimientos sobre los animales.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos del parque, se entero en detalles del estado de su administracion y operacion.
					
					Llegado al acuario, averiguo de la cria de peces, las medidas de abastecimiento de cebo y agua y las variedades de peces de agua salada que se crian.
					
					Escucho con satisfaccion el parte de los funcionarios de que se han tomado perfectas medidas para el aseguramiento de cebos y se ha solucionado el problema de agua salada, un rompecabezas en la cria de peces del mar, al cumplirse el sistema de transporte de agua salada Nampho-Pyongyang.
					
					Dando vueltas por el estanque de focas y el pabellon de reptiles, senalo que lo importante para acondicionar el establo es crear un ambiente similar a la naturaleza, de modo que los visitantes puedan ver en un clima real los animales y estos tengan suficientes condiciones de crecimiento.
					
					En el Pabellon de Animales Regalados, el vio con atencion los animales raros regalados al Dirigente Kim Jong Il por el director del Vivero de Skansen en Suecia, Jonas Whalstram, entre otros la boa de la India y el murcielago grande.
					
					En el establo de fieras, se encontro con la jefa del equipo de cuidado de fieras, Kim Sun Ok, quien lleva 45 anos trabajando en el parque, y con Myong Su Il con casi 30 anos trabajando como cuidador de oso, y evaluo sus trabajos.
					
					En el hospital veterinario construido por la iniciativa del Dirigente, el Comandante Supremo dijo que es importante tomar buenas medidas de prevencion veterinaria y tratamiento de animales.
					
					Evaluo altamente el hecho de que los funcionarios y empleados del parque protegen y cuidan bien los animales y trabajan con inteligencia y pasion para alegrar al pueblo mediante la organizacion minuciosa de las visitas.
					
					Presento las tareas que serviran de guia en la administracion y operacion del parque.
					
					Se debe acondicionar mejor el parque y elevar constantemente la calidad de su operacion, indico.
					
					Hay que ampliar las especies de los animales del parque y aumentar el numero de los de otros paises como jirafa y cebra y los animales raros en el ambito mundial, instruyo.
					
					Se debe construir nuevamente en la entrada del Parque Zoologico Nacional el edificio principal como simbolo y modernizar todos los establos conforme a las caracteristicas de animales y al confort de los visitantes, enseno.
					
					Prosiguio que hay que acondicionar un lugar peculiar de descanso donde esten combinadas el area al aire libre y la zona bajo techo.
					
					Se debe impulsar la repoblacion forestal de las periferias del parque a las alturas del nuevo siglo, dijo.
					
					Apunto la necesidad de tomar medidas de suministro de agua necesaria a la administracion del parque y a la cria de animales.
					
					Hay que instalar nueva tabla-guia que este en armonia con el atributo del parque, concluyo.
					
					Kim Jong Un expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados del parque cumpliran magnificamente con su honrosa mision y deber de servidores al pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita de orientacion Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yang Gon, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Jae Il, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Chun Hong, Ma Won Chun y Jon Il Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Dmitri Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Dmitri Medvedev
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea        Kim Jong Un envio el dia 26 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Rusia Unida, partido politico de toda Rusia, Dmitri Medvedev.
					El mensaje va como sigue:
					
					Le envio calurosa felicitacion en relacion con que Usted fue electo como presidente del partido en XIII Conferencia de Rusia Unida, partido politico de toda Rusia.
					
					Su eleccion deviene la profunda confianza y la esperanza de todos los militantes del partido a Usted.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad confio en realizarse con exitos los temas acordados en los encuentros a nivel supremo Corea-Rusia y expreso la conviccion de que se desarrollaran aun mas en el futuro las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre  dos partidos y dos paises.
					
					Deseo con sinceridad mayores exitos en su responsable trabajo por fortalecer el partido y construir Rusia poderosa y moderna.
					
					Reciba mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Premier coreano se informa en el terreno del estado de faenas agricolas
articles.content:
Premier coreano se informa en el terreno del estado de faenas agricolas
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, averiguo el dia 26 en el terreno como marchan las faenas agricolas en la Granja Saenal del distrito Sinchon y la Granja Cooperativa Oguk del distrito An-ak donde estan grabadas las huellas de guia de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu.
					Los granjeros de ambos lugares estan logrando exitos en el cumplimiento cualitativo y en tiempo apropiado de las inmediatas tareas agricolas, en particular, el transplante de las posturas de arroz, con la determinacion de propiciar abundantes cosechas.
					
					Pese al tiempo desfavorable que persiste estos dias, toman medidas para superar la sequia acelerando el transplante de las posturas de arroz segun los requerimientos de los metodos agricolas Juche.
					
					El premier apunto que la solucion del problema de alimentos del pueblo es una prioridad para la construccion de un Estado prospero y agrego que todos los funcionarios y trabajadores agricolas deben cumplir con su papel como encargados de llenar el granero del pais.
					
					Instruyo realizar el gradeo segun la norma tecnica y terminar a tiempo y en lo cualitativo el transplante de las posturas de arroz.
					
					Senalo que todos los funcionarios deben atender la vida de los granjeros con afecto maternal al aprender la noble concepcion del pueblo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y asigno tareas a las unidades vinculadas para proveer a tiempo de los materiales agricolas necesarios a dicha faena.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier recorrio la Salina Juventud de Hwangnam en visperas de inauguracion.
					
					La construccion de esa salina de centenares de hectareas de dimension hara gran aporte al desarrollo economico y al mejoramiento de la vida popular en la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur al producir la sal en grandes cantidades.
					
					Recorriendo la salina muy rentable, Choe apunto la necesidad de mejorar el nivel tecnico de los obreros para que ellos apoyen al partido con el incremento de la produccion de sal.

articles.title: Enterrados en Cementerio de Martires restos mortales de So Man Sul
articles.content:
Enterrados en Cementerio de Martires restos mortales de So Man Sul
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedaron enterrados en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos enclavado en el capitalino suburbio los restos mortales del difunto So Man Sul, diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Heroe del Trabajo y presidente del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon).
					So dedico todo lo suyo para defender y materializar la idea y la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il e hizo  hasta el ultimo momento de su vida la especial contribucion al desarrollo del autoctono movimiento de los compatriotas en el ultramar.
					
					La ceremonia de enterramiento tuvo lugar el dia 28 en el mismo lugar.
					
					Participo en la ocasion Choe Yong Rim, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon y otros funcionarios del organo del Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios, organismos relacionados con los compatriotas en el ultramar y las entidades religiosas, los funcionarios de la Chongryon, los coreanos residentes en Japon, las familias y parientes del difunto.
					
					Despidio el duelo Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.
					
					Choe dijo que gracias a la confianza y el amor del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, So pudo exaltar su fama como autentico revolucionario, ferviente patriotico y veterano activista en el ultramar, quien recuerda la patria, la nacion y el mundo.
					
					Subrayo que la patria y el pueblo no olvidaran para siempre la noble vida y las inmortales proezas de So Man Sul quien esta vivo en el regazo del Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Mientras se interpretaba el canto funebre y se tiraba la salva en honor de un difunto, fueron enterrados  los restos mortales en la tumba.
					
					Los funcionarios directivos del partido y el estado y las familias del difunto cubrieron con la tierra.
					
					Fue depositado una ofrenda floral enviada por  Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Ademas, fueron colocados ofrendas y ramos de flores en nombre del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, el Consejo de Ministros, el partido  amigo, el CC del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, el Presidium del Comite Central de la Chongryon, las entidades sociales, ministerios, los organos relacionados con los compatriotas en el ultramar y las entidades religiosas.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto.

articles.title: Solucion del problema nuclear depende de EE.UU.: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Solucion del problema nuclear depende de EE.UU.: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el ex vicepresidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU., James Cartwright, insistio en la necesidad de reducir valientemente las armas nucleares de EE.UU. y otras potencias nucleares diciendo que eso "hace falta tambien para conseguir la confianza con que se pueda exigir la limitacion del programa nuclear de los paises como el Norte de Corea e Iran". 
					Menos mal que en EE.UU. haya hombres que tienen un modo de pensar relativamente correcto, senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 27 y prosigue: 
					
					La mayoria de armas nucleares existentes en el mundo es producto de la guerra fria y no tiene ninguna razon de existir hasta ahora puesto que ha finalizado ese periodo de enfrentamientos. 
					
					El problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana es tambien producto directo de la injusta politica de amenaza militar y chantaje nuclear de EE.UU. 
					
					Si el imperio no la hubiera practicando, la RPDC no habria procurado el disuasivo nuclear que cuesta enorme trabajo y fabulosos fondos ni surgido el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Dado que en la parte mitad de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno estan desplegadas las fuerzas nucleares de EE.UU. amenazando la seguridad de la RPDC y continua la politica hostil del primero a la segunda, es absurdo que esta renuncie unilateralmente su disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					Si EE.UU. desea de veras la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, debe abandonar su politica hostil a la RPDC y cancelar de raices la amenaza nuclear sobre ella. 
					
					Cuando se compruebe que EE.UU. no hostiliza a la RPDC y es eliminada su amenaza nuclear, la segunda no necesitaria ni una sola arma nuclear. 
					
					Esto insinua que la clave de la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana esta en EE.UU. 
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con responsabilidad dandose cuenta de que de su actitud depende la solucion o no del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana.
